steps.description: 1. Locate the first connected black region that is completely enclosed by green pixels (i.e., a black pocket not connected to the image border) scanning from the top row down and left to right, and recolor every pixel of that region to yellow.

2. Locate the second connected black region that is completely enclosed by green (the next enclosed pocket in the same top-to-bottom, left-to-right scan) and recolor every pixel of that region to yellow.
3. Locate the third connected black region that is completely enclosed by green (the next enclosed pocket in the scan order) and recolor every pixel of that region to yellow.
4. Locate the fourth connected black region that is completely enclosed by green (the next enclosed pocket in the scan order) and recolor every pixel of that region to yellow.
